title: Provides that motor vehicles, with certain exceptions, shall not be operated with an accumulation of snow or ice on the surface thereof
summary: Provides that motor vehicles, with certain exceptions, shall not be operated with an accumulation of snow or ice on the surface thereof; establishes fines for violation of these provisions.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring surfaces of certain motor vehicles to be cleared of accumulated snow, sleet, or hail
